General.Name: Casa Emtia Petrol Kimyevi ve Turevleri Sanayi ve Ticaret AS
General.Description: Casa Emtia Petrol Kimyevi ve Turevleri San. Tic. A.S. engages in trading of commodities in Turkey. It trades in gasoline, diesel, and fuel oil products. The company was founded in 1976 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey.
General.Address: Çengeldere Mh. Ulus Cd., Istanbul, Turkey
